alert.note: Alert for Iron; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 30 at 3:20PM EDT until May 02 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING TO 2 AM EDT /1 AM CDT/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 17 inches. The lowest snow accumulations will occur around Crystal Falls. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph on Monday. * WHERE...Iron and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ this evening to 2 AM EDT /1 AM CDT/ Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 AM EDT /10 AM CDT/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning and Monday evening commutes. With heavy wet snow collecting on trees and powerlines, the stronger winds late tonight and Monday may cause tree damage and power outages. The wet, heavy snow will be difficult to move.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling this morning. If you must travel later tonight and Monday, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
